overview: My grandfather was killed at the beginning of the war in Colombia, after that fact several men in the family have chosen weapons. Like my cousin´s son that was injured in combat by the paramilitary, whom was recruted with only 15 years of age.  My father managed to build a different life for himself. That is the hope that I wish illuminates my son Matías and all of us, the sons and daughters of war.
title: Matias' Tree
